 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: The Pilot
1.plot: Multi-talented eleven year old Jadagrace, uploads a homemade music video of herself onto the net which quickly goes viral. Her amazing talent comes to the attention of Hollywood music producer Danny P., who brings Jadagrace and her BBF Ashley out to Hollywood and promises to make her a star. Danny P. comes through getting Jadagrace her own TV variety show and she's on her way to the big time! Each week is a hilarious "show within a show" situation comedy jam packed with music, comedy and magic as Jadagrace, her cast mates and entourage deal with the everyday craziness...

2.title: The New Sponsor
2.plot: Jadagrace is going to be the spokesperson for Sasquatch Energy Drink, the show's new sponsor, even though the drink tastes like smelly feet. Bradley, the cute new craft service boy wants desperately to be a cast member on the show and is auditioning for Jadagrace every chance he gets.

3.title: Sticky Fingers
3.plot: Ashley is accused of shoplifting by an obnoxious Mall Cop, (Kevin Farley) When the cast and crew's possessions start disappearing, they all assume it was Ashley. Meanwhile the studio is overrun by crazy Las Vegas variety acts auditioning for the show, including a cute Capuchin Monkey Jadagrace has befriended, who may not be as cute as it seems.

4.title: She Drives Me Crazy
4.plot: When Danny P loses his license he offers to take Manika in for her driver's test, cheating, as he takes the written test along with her. Jadagrace and Ashley try to revive Bernie, a colorful Macaw bird who is the star of Murray The Magician's act, after they let the bird eat an entire bag of Ashley's pork skins.

5.title: A Salute for Dad
5.plot: Bradley the craft service boy, lied to his father and told him he is really a cast member on the show. When his father returns from military service to watch a live taping of The Jadagrace Show, Jadagrace arranges to let Bradley go on in the show while Ashley detains Danny P away from the set at a rock-climbing wall.

6.title: Evil Cousin
6.plot: Jadagrace warns everyone when her "Evil Cousin" Juliet comes for a visit. The rest of the cast, think Jadagrace is overreacting after they meet Juliet and find her to be sweet and generous. Ashley is failing set school because she can't understand the new set teacher, Miss Lopez's heavy Spanish accent. Danny has a crush on Miss Lopez but can't get close enough to ask her out because of her vicious Chihuahua Lupe.

7.title: Episode #1.7

8.title: Episode #1.8

9.title: The Studio Ghost
9.plot: Jadagrace and Ashley's constant prank scaring of the lot security guard Wendell is getting out of hand. Wendell tells them that the studio is haunted by a ghost and bets them they can't spend the night in the studio alone without crying for their mommies.

10.title: Horsing Around: Part 1
10.plot: Danny has volunteered the entire cast of the Jadagrace Show as a prize at a charity auction. The winners are the owners of a real western dude ranch who force Jadagrace and her cast mates to tend to all their chores around the ranch. The ranch owner Mabel Tillman, has set her sights on Danny as husband number five.

11.title: Horsing Around: Part 2
11.plot: Danny has volunteered the entire cast of the Jadagrace Show as a prize at a charity auction. The winners are the owners of a real western dude ranch who force Jadagrace and her cast mates to tend to all their chores around the ranch. The ranch owner Mabel has set her sights on Danny as a new husband. The 2nd day at the dude ranch Jadagrace and Ashley befriend a friendly pig they name Squeaky and try to keep him from being the main course at the ranch's big ho-down dinner. Danny and Mabel get lost on a horseback ride and Danny has a run in with a rattle snake. ...

12.title: The Body Guard
12.plot: When a group of pranksters known as "The Pie Hit Squad" threaten to "pie" Jadagrace in the face, Danny beefs up the lot security and takes the kids to a karate dojo to hire a student as her bodyguard. Danny fakes having a black belt to impress Miss Lopez and gets into a fight with world karate champ and international martial arts star, Gary Daniels.

13.title: A Tiger's Tale: Part 1
13.plot: Jadagrace and Murray The Magician are in trouble for booking a live Bengal Tiger named Tabitha on the show without Danny P's permission. When the tiger's cage is accidentally left open, Murray and his assistants must find the big cat and put it back in the cage before someone becomes lunch. Danny P is afraid he may lose Jadagrace to his nemeses, a slick hip-hop producer, "Sammy Big Daddy Slim" played by comedian actor Rondell Sheridan from "That's So Raven".

imdb.plot outline: Multi-talented eleven year old Jadagrace, uploads a homemade music video of herself onto the internet which quickly goes viral. Her amazing talent comes to the attention of Hollywood music producer Danny P., who brings Jadagrace and her BBF Ashley out to Hollywood and promises to make her a star. Danny P. comes through getting Jadagrace her own TV variety show and she's on her way to the big time! Each week is a hilarious "show within a show" situation comedy jam packed with music, comedy and magic as Jadagrace, her cast mates and entourage deal with the everyday craziness of a showbiz life for a little kid. What better place than Las Vegas, "The City Of Entertainment" for Jadagrace to discover fresh new talent for her show. A hot Teen Pop Star, a Wacky Magician are just a few added to the mix of crazy characters. Throw in some monkeys, tigers, elephants, pigs and horses, and it's a real three ring circus of a show.

Each week is a hilarious "show within a show" situation comedy jam packed with music, comedy and magic as Jadagrace, her cast mates and entourage deal with the everyday craziness of a showbiz life for a little kid. What better place than Las Vegas, "The City Of Entertainment" for Jadagrace to discover fresh new talent for her show. A hot Teen Pop Star, a Wacky Magician are just a few added to the mix of crazy characters. Throw in some monkeys, tigers, elephants, pigs and horses, and it's a real three ring circus of a show.::Anonymous
